questions: How to post a defined message to a Slack channel using ThamesThrive?
What is the "Post to Slack Channel" plugin?
How to use the "Post to Slack Channel" plugin to post a message to a Slack channel?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive post a defined message to a Slack channel?
Yes, ThamesThrive can post a defined message to a Slack channel using the "Post to Slack Channel" plugin
